cui_name: Stage III Cutaneous Melanoma AJCC v6
reasoning: Stage III melanoma represents regional lymph node involvement. Global melanoma incidence ~20 per 100k; Stage III comprises ~15-20% of melanoma cases, estimated ~3-4 per 100k. Data from GLOBOCAN and cancer registries with stage-specific breakdowns.
source: GLOBOCAN 2005 melanoma incidence data with AJCC staging distribution
